item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "There are painters who transform the sun to a yellow spot, but there are others who with the help of their art and their intelligence, transform a yellow spot into sun" -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Bad artists copy. Good artists steal." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "And, in the end The love you take is equal to the love you make." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Ringo Starr
Cristapia add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "Art is what you can get away with." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "It’s not what you are that counts, it’s what they think you are." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "An artist is somebody who produces things that people don't need to have." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "I like boring things." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "Most people in America think Art is a man's name." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "I think having land and not ruining it is the most beautiful art that anybody could ever want." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "A wise girl kisses but doesn't love, listens but doesn't believe, and leaves before she is left." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I don't mind living in a man's world, as long as I can be a woman in it." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "We are all of us stars, and we deserve to twinkle." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Frida Kahlo
item.description: "I paint my own reality. The only thing I know is that I paint because I need to, and I paint whatever passes through my head without any other consideration." -- Frida Kahlo

item.title: Cristapia add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein
